name: Relaxable
description: The flagship product of Relaxable.com is our mobile app which consists of relaxing videos, sounds, meditations, and stories. Our mobile app is currently available for download on iOS and Android devices. With the launch of $RELAX token, we plan to develop a web based platform in addition to the mobile app and integrate web3 features such as subscriptions and in app promotions. Seeing as RELAX is a decentralized token with no dev wallet, marketing wallet, or tax wallet, we also plan to network with other companies in the health and wellness industry and introduce the to the possibilities of using the RELAX token in their products, services, events and more.
